Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I have started making a few planes that resembled planes that are in service with the US and/or British Military.

All planes I create will have advanced SAS, this is because I cannot fly a plane to save my life, so I use it to level out after banking a turn... which means that with some planes that may be the only reason it is on there

As for the designs of the planes I try to keep them as representative to the real life as possible... but due to KSP not liking certain designs it means that some things may not look realistic. These things include: Wheel placements, Engine Placements, Addition of Winglets, etc.

When designing the propulsion systems I make it so that if the plane is supposed to have a jet engine, it will have the turbojet engine. If it should have a propeller then it will have the basic jet engine (This is just because I hate the basic jet engine)

Some screenshots can be found here: http://thejordsta95.imgur.com/all/

To download the craft files go to: http://www./?jnnce7tttmvbnqf

So far the planes I have got "finished":

Vulcan (With added VTOL system)

B-2 Spirit (Looks dodgy, cannot take ASAS off after take off... must take off with ASAS on... it's only there because I wouldn't give up)

C-26 Metroliner

Cessna UC-35

CT-36 Sabreliner

E-2 Hawkeye

SR-71 Blackbird

If you have suggestions on what I should do next, feel free to give me suggestions

Thanks for reading

-Jordan

Edited May 29, 2013 by jordsta95
Ditto; you need to set your pics to public.

Sorry about that, first time using imgur

Everyone else uses it, so I didn't want to use something that no one, but me, would know how to use
i made a giant military tank but no plane
Why are weapons blasphemy? They are the smart way of defending against the other space station(s)

I do like the Blackbird, and have tried to recreate it many times, but I do think that it is a harder one to get a good flight time out of, because (unless my flying is really inefficient) fuel runs out too quick with toridial engines

But I will give it a go

And then probably release the first "pack" once I have that one finished

Dude, you got my plane! P-3C is a beast. Although we are pushing to the P-8A Poseidon now(which is turbofan) will make it easier to make.

FLYNAVY!

Sweet

So you fly the Orion in the navy? I envy you
